segments.text: This kitchen scene feels a bit heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is diligently drying dishes, unaware of the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing quietly, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle shows how close the danger is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are trying to get cookies on their own.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he could get hurt badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, but it's all so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They just want a treat, but no one's watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems idyllic, untouched by this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how small mishaps can lead to bigger problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mom would notice and keep everyone safe.
segments.speaker: PAR
